about.dedicationText: The development of this application is a tribute to Grandma Clarita from her grandson who loves her very much, a full stack developer who also handles mobile technology like Expo. The base of this application is built using Expo and React Native as the framework.
about.description1: This application is a digital modernization of Grandma Clarita's famous 'Green Book,' which contained the family's most cherished and traditional recipes.
about.description2: Clarita would lend her precious book to her daughters Jeannette, María Clara, Mónica, Pilar, and Helga, who learned and enjoyed these delicious recipes. The last version in PDF format was distributed as copies to various family members, and now this application brings those same recipes into the digital age.
about.description3: Developed with modern technologies like Expo and React Native, this application allows the entire family to access, share, and preserve Grandma Clarita's recipes easily and accessibly from any mobile device. Additionally, users can upload their own recipes and share them with others, and in the Explore section you will find users' favorite recipes.
about.libroVerdeText1: They say that in life you must plant a tree, have a child, and write a book!
about.libroVerdeText2: Well, I believe that this maxim, Grandma has fulfilled it to the letter and with honors!
about.libroVerdeText3: How many times have all of us and other family members witnessed the arguments over 'Where Is My Green Book, Who Took It,' then we had to search through several houses to find it and fortunately we always did.
about.libroVerdeText4: In 2003, I suppose fearing that someone would take it away forever and leave us without it, Grandma had the brilliant idea to give each of us a copy, so we could have it and surely - although she never said it - so she wouldn't go crazy with all of us asking every day for her delicious recipes.
about.libroVerdeText5: And as always, she got to work and transferred to the computer all the recipes she had been writing in her own handwriting throughout her life.
about.libroVerdeText6: Like today, God has given us the joy of being gathered here again, among 'hearths and tablecloths,' it seemed like a fantastic opportunity for all of us who have enjoyed these meals over all these years, to have just like us, this precious book of recipes.
about.libroVerdeText7: THE FAMOUS GREEN BOOK OF GRANDMA, YOU NOW HAVE IT!!!

privacy.introText: This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our family recipes application.
privacy.infoText: We may collect the following information: email address (for authentication), recipes you upload to the application, and usage preferences such as language and measurement units.
privacy.useText: We use your information to: provide access to application features, allow you to save and share recipes, improve user experience, and send notifications about important updates.
privacy.shareText: We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties. Recipes you share publicly will be visible to other users of the application.
privacy.securityText: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy.rightsText: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can do this from your account settings or by contacting us directly.
privacy.contactText: If you have questions about this privacy policy, you can contact us through the application settings section.
